description:
Extrapolated persons who use the PC

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
63931 Information and communication technology (ICT)

Definition:
Based on the microcensus, the sample results were separately
grossed up to the person populations by applying simple
expansion estimators and, using non-linear regression
estimation, were adjusted to the joint marginal distribution
of several variables. The adjustment at person level was
made using the variables: age, sex, education, social
status, household type and Land, as well as age combined
with sex.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2016
name: Extrapolated persons who use the PC
